titles.title: Federal Withholding Tax Repeal Act of 2011
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the withholding of income and social security taxes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 3/3/2011--Introduced. Federal Withholding Tax Repeal Act of 2011- Repeals provisions of the Internal Revenue Code requiring withholding of income, social security, and railroad retirement taxes from wages.
